data.actual_result: It's showing the string of the previous langauge
data.expected_result: It should show the English string for "Change Avatar"
data.short_description: "Change avatar" string is weirdly cached with the previous language (not related to https://trello.com/c/HSd5hccP)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings - Change to a non English language - Let the auto reload happen then manually reload again - Go back to English - Click on edit in "My account" then hover over your current avatar - Observe
